job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: At PayPal NASDAQ PYPL we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone regardless of background or economic standing has access to affordable convenient and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives Were a purposedriven company and our beliefs are the foundation of how we conduct business every day Were guided by our core values of Inclusion Innovation Collaboration and Wellness Collectively these values inspire us to work together as One Team with our customers at the center of everything we do and to take care of ourselves each other and the communities in which we live and work We challenge the status quo ask questions and find solutions Join us as we enable the hopes dreams and ambitions of millions of people around the worldbrbrstrongJob Description SummarybrstrongIn support of PayPals mission and social innovation priorities the PayPal Giving Platform harnesses the power of our technology and scale to inspire giving around the world Our products enable fundraising experiences that connect people businesses and nonprofits with their communities and move billions of dollars every year to hundreds of thousands of worthy causes We are looking for a full stack developer with experience in building highperforming scalable enterprisegrade applications As a member of the team you will help us build product solutions with outstanding quality We are always interested for strong technologists who are passionate to solve complex computer engineering problems in a repeatable and maintainable way You will build strong competencies in design data structures and algorithms along with a technical fascination for how everything ties togetherbrbrstrongJob DescriptionbrstrongulliDeep familiarity with Java Java Spring Boot Junit REST API  SQL Maven amp Git lili5 years of working experience in software development with related technologiesliliAble to take on and lead projects to drive deliverablesliliExpertise and work experience with objectoriented design and design patterns and programming skillsliliExpertise in high level design and translating them into detailed design artifactsliliExperience with database like MySQL Oracle mongo couchBaseliliPerform detailed analysis and technical designsliliExpertise in secure coding practices and software engineering best practicesliliAbility to drive projects independentlyliliKnowledge or experience of full stack development with NodeJS is a plusliliSolid understanding of the PDLC life cycleliliExperience with test automation TDD unitintegrationfunctional testingliliDisciplined approach to testing and quality assuranceliliHandson knowledge of version control systems such as GITbrbrliulstrongSkills amp BehaviorsbrstrongulliCreative and innovative able to think out of the boxliliTrack record as a results oriented person with a delivery focusliliStrong work ethic Flexible and openmindedliliAble to work with Cross functional team in different timezoneliliEnjoy fast paced dynamic environmentliliUnderstand issues quickly and solve problems efficientlybrbrliulFor more than 20 years PayPal has remained at the forefront of the digital payment revolution By leveraging technology to make financial services and commerce more convenient affordable and secure our open digital payments platform gives PayPals 400 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments paying or getting paid Available in more than 200 markets around the world the PayPal platform including Braintree Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currenciesbrbrPayPal provides equal employment opportunity EEO to all persons regardless of age color national origin citizenship status physical or mental disability race religion creed gender sex pregnancy sexual orientation gender identity andor expression genetic information marital status status with regard to public assistance veteran status or any other characteristic protected by federal state or local law In addition PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilitiesbrbrREQ ID R0072776
